## Problem 1

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(haven)
library(rvest)
library(stringr)
library(forcats)

pups_data = read.csv(file = "./data/FAS_pups.csv") %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  gather(key = PD_outcome, value = days, pd_ears:pd_walk) %>%
  mutate(sex = str_replace(sex, "1", "male"),
         sex = str_replace(sex, "2", "female")) %>%
  filter(!is.na(days))
```
